content.rendered:
Medical Front Office | Stillwater, Oklahoma
  • Full-Time, Monday-Friday 8:00am-5:00pm
  • 2+ years experience in a medical front office required
  • Experience with EMR a plus
  • Responsible for greeting patients, answering phones with a smile, making and rescheduling appointments, taking co-pays, scanning information, and other front office duties
  • $10-12+/hour
